body: An undead lord must select the Death domain (and the Undead subdomain, if available in the campaign). She does not gain a second domain. In all other respects, this works like and replaces the standard cleric's domain ability.
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Cleric/Cleric Archetypes/Undead Lord/Death Magic
name: Death Magic
